qas.question: What body operates the state schools in the Marshall Islands?
Along with the University of the South Pacific, what tertiary education institution exists in the Marshall Islands?

context: The <a0_0>Ministry of Education (Marshall Islands)<a0_0/> operates the state schools in the Marshall Islands. There are two tertiary institutions operating in the Marshall Islands, the <a1_0>College of the Marshall Islands<a1_0/> and the University of the South Pacific.
